meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a firefighter.
meanings.sent1: The firemanic equipment was heavy and sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The firemanic helmet protected his head from falling debris.
meanings.sent3: The firemanic boots were so big, they made him walk like a robot.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was as firemanic as the flames she fought.
meanings.sent5: The firemanic badge on his uniform shone brightly in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: In the manner of a firefighter.
meanings.sent1: She ran firemanically towards the burning building.
meanings.sent2: He shouted orders firemanically to his team.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked firemanically at the firetruck passing by.
meanings.sent4: The children played firemanically, pretending to put out imaginary fires.
meanings.sent5: The alarm blared firemanically, signaling danger in the distance.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the duties or skills of a firefighter.
meanings.sent1: His firemanic training prepared him for any emergency.
meanings.sent2: The firemanic drills helped them respond quickly to fires.
meanings.sent3: The firemanic teamwork was crucial in saving the trapped family.
meanings.sent4: Her firemanic instincts kicked in as she rushed to help the injured.
meanings.sent5: The firemanic bravery of the crew inspired others to join the force.
